page.title: 05LEISURE TIME IN DEWSBURY
page.content: I go to Chickenley Youth Club which is open on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays from 6.30 to 9.00pm.The entrance fee is 15p.We play rounders and netball,and play and dance to records. I also read in my leisure time and I enjoy adventure books by Enid Blyton.I also enjoy writing my own stories.I go swimming with my friends at Dewsbury Sports Centre. Apart from netball and rounders I enjoy a game of 'pegs' with my friends and we go cycling.I like listening to records and Paul Young is my favourite pop singer.As a hobby I like collecting old coins. On a Saturday we pay a visit to Dewsbury and I spend all my money on the market there.In the afternoon I go to Chickenley Cricket Club and watch the men play cricket.
